assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study did not involve human participants, individual-level data collected from humans, or bio-samples collected from humans.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Darci L. Sternen is employed by Seattle Children’s Hospital Laboratory, which offered a DNA bank service until 2020. Laura M. Amendola is an employee of Illumina, Inc. Samuel J. Huang declares no potential conflict of interest.
